long_description: The super-soft Wander Dog Bed from Kurgo makes a comfortable home away from home for your 4-legged travel companion. Waterproof Rufftex(TM) bottom features a blend of rubber and corduroy to keep it from slipping around in the car; plush fleece top supplies luxurious comfort for your pup. Dog bed rolls up in seconds; built-in handle makes toting it a cinch. Hidden pocket offers a spot to stash something that smells like home. Kurgo Wander Dog Bed is machine washable for easy cleaning. Medium size is designed for dogs under 40 lbs.; large size designed for dogs over 40 lbs. Closeout.
short_description: The super-soft Wander Dog Bed from Kurgo makes a comfortable home away from home for your 4-legged travel companion.
